instructions: Identify specific basketball actions occurring in the video frames. Be precise about the movements, techniques, and their execution.

actions.name: Jump Shot
actions.description: Player jumps and shoots the ball with proper form and follow-through

actions.name: Layup
actions.description: Player approaches the basket and gently lays the ball off the backboard or directly into the hoop

actions.name: Dunk
actions.description: Player jumps and forcefully puts the ball through the hoop with one or both hands

actions.name: Pass
actions.description: Player throws the ball to a teammate (chest pass, bounce pass, overhead pass, etc.)

actions.name: Dribble
actions.description: Player bounces the ball with one hand while moving or stationary

actions.name: Rebound
actions.description: Player grabs a missed shot as it comes off the rim or backboard

actions.name: Block
actions.description: Defensive player deflects or stops an opponent's shot attempt

actions.name: Steal
actions.description: Defensive player takes the ball from an offensive player

actions.name: Screen
actions.description: Offensive player positions their body to block a defender from guarding a teammate

actions.name: Free Throw
actions.description: Uncontested shot from the free throw line following a foul

actions.name: Crossover
actions.description: Player quickly dribbles the ball from one hand to the other to change direction

actions.name: Pump Fake
actions.description: Player pretends to shoot to get defender in the air, then moves past them

actions.name: Post Up
actions.description: Player positions with back to basket, using body to shield ball from defender

actions.name: Fast Break
actions.description: Quick offensive play where team moves ball rapidly up court after gaining possession

actions.name: Defensive Stance
actions.description: Player positions in balanced, ready position to guard opponent
